reviews.text: Got to the station this morning and there was a delay no train coming through the station at all .The station master on duty was very helpful and the people who were traveling to London he got taxis to Southampton for us at the railways expense so we could continue our journey as it was a long trip can not thank him enough

On the plus side the station is nicely planted with flowers, this is carried out by volunteers, not South Western Railway. If you are using the station in the morning waiting rooms and toilets are available, if you come after 13.00 then they are all locked up, no toilet, no waiting rooms and not even a tap to drink from. On top of this if you're disabled look forward to a hike up to the main road, cross the bridge and then back down to the station if you need to change platforms. Is this really acceptable in this day and age?
Very clean central organised easy drop off pick up good Road communication to it can't fault it staff very friendly
